name: Spot the Hole
shortDescription: Fully autonomous and intelligent platform to detect, monitor and manage potholes issues. An end-to-end system with a PWA front-end for users to report potholes and government authorities to track and manage them.
longDescription: Fully autonomous and intelligent platform to detect, monitor and manage potholes issues. An end-to-end system with a PWA front-end for users to report potholes and government authorities to track and manage them.
